info.name: A Flying Sound Shape
info.description:
Motion of a string constrained to a 4d sphere: x^2+y^2+z^2+w^2=1.
From the initial state, the string is driven by the basic wave equation.
iMouse.x = rotation in the (x,y) plane
iMouse.y = rotation in the (z,w) plane
